title: Did ‘John-John’ From ‘Sesame Street’ End Up On a Sex Offender List?
subtitle: A 2-year-old who appeared on the children's show in 1971 shares a lot of biographical information with a known registered sex offender.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A child named "John-John" who appeared on "Sesame Street" in 1971 is now a registered sex offender.
